title: Implement Task Management UI in Admin Portal
description: Create a comprehensive task overview and management interface in the Flutter admin portal that mirrors the backend folder-based task system, allowing real-time monitoring, status updates, and task analytics
acceptance_criteria: Task overview dashboard displaying all tasks from backend system
Real-time task status updates via WebSocket
Task filtering by agent, status, priority, and type
Task detail view showing full metadata, progress, and logs
Visual task board with drag-and-drop status changes
Task creation form integrated with backend API
Progress timeline visualization for each task
Responsive design for desktop and tablet
Integration with existing Mystique dark theme

technical_notes.performance_requirements: Task list must render <500ms for 100+ tasks. Drag-and-drop must be smooth at 60fps.
technical_notes.security_considerations: Only authenticated admin users can modify task status. All API calls must include JWT tokens.
